feed.title: Yamtrack Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.14.4
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed not being able to track manga from MangaUpdates whose chapter count is not up to date (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/10a31577051465aabc085faa71993cad24a9dc8b)
  • Fixed creation of seasons with a wrong title when creating it by viewing episodes (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/6c9b58f723694238730db2ff821903f3bf7160b1)

Other

  • Added tooltips for some imports on how to find slugs/ids for certain sources (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/018b3242440d8c7206280df3d8667dd4d33519ab)

Maintenance

  • Bump redis[hiredis] from 5.0.8 to 5.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/232
  • Bump django from 5.1 to 5.1.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/231

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.14.3...v0.14.4

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.14.5
entry.content:
Fixes

  • Fixed import error from Trakt for shows with incomplete TMDB metadata (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/c669cdbe1507fd6b23b7ce1ace4959269243a5aa)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.14.4...v0.14.5

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.15.0
entry.content:
Features

  • Added import from SIMKL by @FuzzyGrim in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/245
  • Added the ability to create custom media entries, for niche media that cannot be found via supported APIs (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/94cb0d8775592ba76d917a9a528d95d4399fc986)
  • Added CSRF environment variable for use behind reverse proxies by @stignarnia in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/250

Fixes

  • Fixed anime details error when missing broadcast time (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/3978d8df8a39683f88fb181a7ffafca2ab51ca79)
  • Fixed the link to the details page from the home page for medias from secondary API sources (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/1a2296ce9db50a535bdf94d5000fdbbe9ca0bae1)

Maintenance

  • Bump crispy-bootstrap5 from 2024.2 to 2024.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/239
  • Bump aiohttp from 3.10.8 to 3.10.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/243
  • Bump redis[hiredis] from 5.1.0 to 5.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/249
  • Bump django from 5.1.1 to 5.1.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/242
  • Bump ruff from 0.6.8 to 0.7.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/252

New Contributors

  • @stignarnia made their first contribution in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/250

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.14.5...v0.15.0

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.16.0
entry.content:
Features

  • Added Jellyfin webhook integration by @FuzzyGrim in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/262
  • Improve videogames search (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/0db254430c71789b0dc9d24127b6196a2e06e6e8)

Fixes

  • Added better validation for time played for videogames forms (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/0b094921ab165359e0bc243d03eb0ef1e4b7aff0)
  • Added better description messages for Custom Lists and Tasks page (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/9ad9acf040fa89d355b89a2a2b5b3716a13ac449)

Other

  • Remove tvdb mappings from kitsu imports because of inconsistent API values (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/2f16dc5fe8ac2810955e36502ad64e3b073eabd3)

Maintenance

  • Bump dorny/paths-filter from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/253
  • Bump whitenoise[brotli] from 6.7.0 to 6.8.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/256
  • Bump pillow from 10.4.0 to 11.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/258
  • Bump coverage from 7.6.1 to 7.6.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/271
  • Bump aiohttp from 3.10.10 to 3.11.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/269
  • Bump codecov/codecov-action from 4 to 5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/264
  • Bump fakeredis from 2.25.1 to 2.26.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/254
  • Bump djlint from 1.35.2 to 1.36.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/261
  • Bump django from 5.1.2 to 5.1.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/273
  • Bump pytest-playwright from 0.5.2 to 0.6.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/274
  • Bump aiohttp from 3.11.7 to 3.11.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/276
  • Bump ruff from 0.7.2 to 0.8.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/275

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.15.0...v0.16.0

entry.title: New release for Yamtrack: v0.16.1
entry.content:
Features

  • Now the episodes of an item will be added immediately to the calendar when it starts to be tracked (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/a19852c246fb98d0cae14af4bcf220f96f41868a)
  • Added automatic retrieval of metadata if title or image is missing in Yamtrack csv import (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/1693cad9f499c937b816ce1a58a206d545ee46b9)

Fixes

  • Fixed generation of media id for manually created items (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/c359493fdc706759a418de7c8d2c412531958a0f)
  • Fixed special seasons were displaying their title incorrectly (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/697cde9f059ba12f83bc4890a6f8ecd0ec32d0a0)
  • Fixed incorrectly formatted image for the cover of a list when its first item has no image (https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/commit/1693cad9f499c937b816ce1a58a206d545ee46b9)

Maintenance

  • Bump aiohttp from 3.11.8 to 3.11.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/285
  • Bump ruff from 0.8.0 to 0.8.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/284
  • Bump django from 5.1.3 to 5.1.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/283
  • Bump djlint from 1.36.1 to 1.36.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/pull/282

Full Changelog: https://github.com/FuzzyGrim/Yamtrack/compare/v0.16.0...v0.16.1
